TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewImageColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的類別，用來以邏輯方式主機的儲存格顯示影像。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that display images. A都有相關聯中每個，與它有交集。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每個資料格是否包含該上的值，取決於屬性。Each cell is capable of containing an or an , depending on the value of the property. 顯示圖示適合容納影像透明度。Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency. 根據預設，空白資料格會顯示預設錯誤圖形。By default, empty cells display a default error graphic. 若要避免此圖顯示的資料格的值等於`null`或，將所傳回的資料格的樣式物件屬性屬性設`null`之前加入至控制項的資料列。To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or , set the property of the cell style object returned by the property to `null` before adding rows to the control. 不過這不影響新的資料錄的資料列。This does not affect the row for new records, however. 若要避免錯誤圖形顯示資料列中對新記錄時控制項屬性值是`true`，您也必須是明確地設定儲存格的值為`null`控制項的處理常式中事件或一組資料行的執行個體的內容-衍生型別與覆寫屬性，傳回`null`。To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control event or set the column property to an instance of a -derived type with an overridden property that returns `null`. 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用影像來建立井字遊戲。The following code example demonstrates how to use images to create a TicTacToe game. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#0)]

para.span: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化資料行，藉由設定下列屬性。This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||新使用其屬性初始化為`valuesAreIcons`參數值。A new with its property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| ||`valuesAreIcons` 參數的值。The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| |的屬性所傳回的物件屬性。The property of the object returned by the property.|| |的屬性所傳回的物件屬性。The property of the object returned by the property.|類型的標準錯誤圖形如果`valuesAreIcons`是`true`並輸入如果`valuesAreIcons`是`false`。A standard error graphic of type if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| 若要確保的 alpha 色板正確繪製儲存格的值時，請使用這個建構函式`valuesAreIcons`參數值的`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立新儲存格的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: ，做為資料欄中所有其他儲存格的模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式類別初始化這個屬性，以新建。The constructors for the class initialize this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者的介面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 這些變更才很明顯之後會重新產生資料行, (例如，藉由排序資料行，或透過呼叫方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性，類似於此屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 管理 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides Property DefaultCellStyle As DataGridViewCellStyle

public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ DefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行的預設儲存格樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值傳回由這個屬性具有下列的初始屬性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 屬性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|預設值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| ||| ||類型的標準錯誤圖形如果初始屬性值是`true`; 否則即為型別的標準錯誤圖形。A standard error graphic of type if the initial property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type .| 這些值會覆寫中指定的值屬性控制項，但可能會覆寫其他的儲存格樣式屬性。These values override the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要防止標準錯誤圖形的出現`null`或儲存格的值，設定這個儲存格樣式物件的屬性`null`或錯誤圖形，然後再將資料列新增至控制項。To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or cell values, set the property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control. 不過這不影響新的資料錄的資料列。This does not affect the row for new records, however. 若要避免錯誤圖形顯示資料列中對新記錄時控制項屬性值是`true`，您也必須是明確地設定儲存格的值為`null`或您自己的錯誤圖形控制項的處理常式事件或一組資料行的執行個體的內容-衍生型別與覆寫屬性，傳回`null`或您自己的錯誤圖形。To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control event or set the column property to an instance of a -derived type with an overridden property that returns `null` or your own error graphic. 如果屬性所傳回的物件屬性有值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形，變更屬性值`true`會自動設定至類型的標準錯誤圖形。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . 如果其值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形，變更屬性值設`false`會自動設定類型的標準錯誤圖形。If has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可描述資料行的影像之字串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.

value.span: 資料行影像的文字描述。

span.span: The textual description of the column image.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來描述提供的映像或屬性。You can use the property to describe the image provided by the or property. 此描述會提供可存取的替代映像。This description provides an accessible alternative to the image. 此外，儲存格的值複製到剪貼簿時，會使用的描述文字。Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定資料行中每個資料格的屬性。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以反映的影像配置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to reflect the image layout. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 當未設定儲存格的 屬性且儲存格的 屬性設定為 時，取得或設定此資料行的儲存格內所顯示的圖示。

span.span: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's property is not set and the cell's property is set to .
The to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定會顯示在資料格不會有值時的資料行不是資料繫結和儲存格的圖示屬性設定為`true`。The property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's property is set to `true`. 資料繫結資料行的資料格沒有相關聯的映像，會顯示標準錯誤的圖形。For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed. 使用屬性而非屬性，可確保會正確繪製 alpha 色板圖示。Using the property rather than the property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly. 如果您想要顯示而不是，將屬性改為設定屬性設`false`。If you want to display an instead of an , set the property instead and set the property to `false`. 您也可以設定表示儲存格是否會顯示個別的儲存格的屬性或屬性值。You can also set the property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the or the property value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Image ^ Image { System::Drawing::Image ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Image ^ value); };
member this.Image : System.Drawing.Image with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 當未設定儲存格的 屬性且儲存格的 屬性設定為 時，取得或設定此資料行的儲存格內所顯示的影像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's property is not set and the cell's property is set to .
The to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定中不會有值的資料行不是資料繫結時的儲存格和儲存格的顯示影像屬性設定為`false`。The property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's property is set to `false`. 資料繫結資料行的資料格沒有相關聯的映像，會顯示標準錯誤的圖形。For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed. 如果您想要顯示而不是，將屬性改為設定屬性設`true`。If you want to display an instead of an , set the property instead and set the property to `true`. 這可確保的 alpha 色板正確繪製。This ensures that the alpha channel of the is painted correctly. 您也可以設定表示儲存格是否會顯示個別的儲存格的屬性或時沒有儲存格的值的屬性值。You can also set the property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the or the property value when there is no cell value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定預設的影像。The following code example demonstrates how to set the default image. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout ImageLayout { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewImageCellLayout value); };

summary.span: 為此資料行取得或設定儲存格中的影像配置。

span.span: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
A that specifies the cell layout.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整及縮放以符合資料格的影像。The following code example demonstrates how to stretch and zoom images to fit cells. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要確保的 alpha 色板正確地繪製值時，將此屬性設定為`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 如果屬性所傳回的物件屬性有值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形，變更屬性值`true`會自動設定至類型的標準錯誤圖形。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type . 如果其值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形，變更屬性值設`false`會自動設定類型的標準錯誤圖形。If has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to the standard error graphic of type .
